snippet.title: POSTAL 2 - Official Trailer (2015)
snippet.description:
POSTAL 2  Official Trailer

Music - 'That's the Break' by Stands With Fists www.standswithfists.com

Buy POSTAL 2 now on Steam http://store.steampowered.com/app/223470

And the brand new expansion pack, Paradise Lost!
http://store.steampowered.com/app/360960/

Also available on GoG.com
http://www.gog.com/game/postal_2
